visual.name: Drill_Down_Shape_Map_PRO_By_ZoomCharts
visual.displayName: Drill Down Shape Map PRO (Filter) by ZoomCharts

dataRoles.description: Draws round shapes around nodes that have this field populated. Use shape layer settings on Format tab to configure the shapes.
dataRoles.name: nodeReachRadius

dataRoles.description: Available shapes: circle, square, rhombus, droplet.
dataRoles.name: shape

trialLicense.description: Currently, this block is meant to be hidden.

info.description: Turn off to hide the info button. The info button can only be removed if a paid license is detected.

preview.description: Hidden field, only enabling it from a theme to allow some functionallity.

hideProperties.description: Hidden field, provide values delimited with ',' from a theme to hide properties.

lassoData.description: Invisible field to just save lasso data

aggregateDistance.description: The approximate minimum distance in pixels between two nodes before they are aggregated together. Min value: 0, Max value: 100.

aggregateMaxZoom.description: Zoom level at which clustering is turned off, and individual nodes are displayed. Accepted values range from 0 (clustering is only enabled at the minimum zoom) to 18 (clustering is enabled at all zoom levels).

aggregatedHighlight.description: Describes the convex shape that covers the area of the aggregated nodes.

clusteredColorMode.description:
'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color
'No fill' - will remove any color on node

colorMode.description:
'Auto' - visual automatically assigns different colors for each category
'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color
'Dynamic' - a color will be picked from defined color Field in 'Fields' tab
'No fill' - will remove any color on node

minNodeRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min node radius' together with 'Max node radius'. If 'Max node radius' is set larger than 'Min node radius' you will get reverse behavior.

maxNodeRadius.description: As node radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min node radius' together with 'Max node radius'. If 'Max node radius' is set larger than 'Min node radius' you will get reverse behavior.

rightClick.description: Behavior, which happens, when right clicking a node, i. e., either to show 'Default Context Menu' or 'Power BI Context Menu'

maxSlicesVisible.description: Number of visible slices before `Others` and `Previous` slices appear

pieSliceOpacity.description: Opacity of the gradient color, 0 - transparent, 100 - opaque. This setting controls the outermost opacity level of the slice, if gradient mode is enabled. Opacity starts from 100 at the Gradient start location and decreases towards the set value in a linear way.

pieGradientStep.description: 0 - inside, 100 - outside. If the outer opacity of the slice is provided, opacity calculation starts at this point from 100 to the specified opacity value.

pieBaseColorSaturationAdjustment.description: 0 means 0% saturation, 100 means 100% saturation;  50 means saturation is unaffected. E.g. 51 means that additional 1% is added to the color's saturation.

pieBaseColorLightnessAdjustment.description: 0 means 0% lightness, 100 means 100% lightness;  50 means lightness is unaffected. E.g. 51 means that additional 1% is added to the color's lightness.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

urlLength.description: When hyperlink comes from 'Tooltip Fields' fields, then limit to length.

showLatLon.description: Toggle whether latitude and longitude are always displayed in the tooltip. Tooltips with no items will not be displayed.

autoFocusData.description: Invisible field to just save semi-auto autofocus data

autoFocus.description: The visual can auto-focus on available data or a specific location. 'None' turns auto focus off. 'Auto' continuously focuses on the available data. 'Focus Once On Load' focuses on the available data, but only on initial load. 'Saved Position' remembers the last position you were at. 'Fixed' focuses to the specified location and zoom level.

maxAutoFocusZoom.description: Sets a limit to how far the map can zoom while auto focusing.

initialLatitude.description: Coordinate of the desired location in decimal format.

initialLongitude.description: Coordinate of the desired location in decimal format.

layerType.description: External shape layer sources (KML, GeoJSON and Image) are only available in the uncertified version of Drill Down Map PRO (Filter or PIN) by ZoomCharts. They are available on AppSource.

sequence.description: Shape layer with a higher sequence is drawn in front of that with a lower sequence. If shape layers have the same sequence, the shape layer with a higher shape layer number is drawn in front (e.g. Shape Layer 2 is in front of Shape Layer 1).

minZoom.description: The minimum zoom level (inclusive) at which the shape layer is displayed.

maxZoom.description: The maximum zoom level (inclusive) at which the shape layer is displayed.

treatEmptyShapesAsMin.description: When enabled, shapes that contain no data are colored according to the Min Fill Color and Opacity settings under Conditional Formatting. When disabled, empty shapes are colored using the non-conditional Fill Color and Opacity settings.

colorScale.description: Select whether color scale is calculated based on relative or absolute differences between Values and Reference Values.

drawLimit.description: The draw limit (0..1) which cells will be considered to belong to the aura. Larger values result in smaller auras. The cells under the center of the node usually have values close to 1, while the edges have values close to 0. Min value: 1, Max value: 9.

intensity.description: The multiplier for the node radius that defines the total area of the aura the node emanates. Note that this defines the size of the aura before the drawLimit value is applied to reduce the size of the aura. Min value: 1, Max value: 90.

aura1.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #1

aura2.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #2

aura3.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #3

aura4.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #4

aura5.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #5

aura6.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #6

aura7.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #7

aura8.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #8

aura9.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #9

aura10.description: Enable or disable customization of Aura #10
